tools.name: zooma
tools.description: Map free-text annotations to ontology terms using ZOOMA API. Perfect for synonym mapping, terminology standardization, and finding ontology terms for free-text values.

property_value.description: The free-text value to map to ontology terms (e.g., 'diabetes', 'NF1', 'Neurofibromatosis')

ontologies.description: Optional list of ontology IDs to search (e.g., ['doid', 'efo', 'chebi'])

required.description: Optional list of required ontology IDs

preferred.description: Optional list of preferred ontology IDs

tools.name: fuzzy_match
tools.description: Find fuzzy matches for a value against a list of candidates using string similarity. Useful for typo correction, finding similar terms in controlled vocabularies, and matching against enum values.

value.description: The value to find matches for

candidates.description: List of candidate strings to match against

max_results.description: Maximum number of results to return (default 5)

tools.name: fuzzy_match_schema
tools.description: Find fuzzy matches for a value against enum values in a JSON schema file. Useful for matching against controlled vocabularies defined in schema.json files.

value.description: The value to find matches for

schema_path.description: Path to the JSON schema file (e.g., 'tasks/broadening_of_narrow_synonyms/schema.json')

field_name.description: Optional field name to match against (if not provided, searches all enum fields)

max_results.description: Maximum number of results to return (default 5)

tools.name: regex_tester
tools.description: Test and validate regex patterns against sample strings. Useful for regex generation tasks to verify patterns work correctly.

test_strings.description: List of strings to test the pattern against

expected_matches.description: Optional list of expected matches (one per test string) for validation

tools.name: schema_validator
tools.description: Validate data against a JSON schema. Useful for validation explanation tasks and ensuring data conforms to schema constraints.

schema_path.description: Path to the JSON schema file (e.g., 'tasks/broadening_of_narrow_synonyms/schema.json')

strict.description: If true, return detailed error information

tools.name: data_pattern_analyzer
tools.description: Analyze data patterns to infer data types (string, integer, number, date, boolean, email, URL). Useful for column type identification tasks.

values.description: List of string values to analyze

analyze_format.description: Whether to analyze specific formats (dates, emails, etc.)

tools.name: synapse_sql_docs
tools.description: Access Synapse SQL query documentation and examples. Provides comprehensive reference for Synapse REST API table query syntax including basics, aggregation functions, filtering, string/date/JSON functions, grouping, sorting, pagination, and more.

section.description: Optional section name to filter documentation. Available sections: basics, aggregation, set_selection, arithmetic, filtering, date_time, string, numeric, json, grouping, sorting, pagination, reserved_columns, list_columns, other, select_functions. If not provided, returns all documentation.
